basic_node.title: Incidence angle
basic_node.description: Incidence angle describing the angle between incoming beam and surface normal.
basic_node.references: [sp65, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-99895-4, p.291-292] [sp46, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S092427161630171X] [sp46, https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1681-7575/ab4523] [sp46, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S1875389213000953] [sp47, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271615002658] [sp47, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S092427161630171X] [sp47, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-642-10523-4, p.93] [sp47, https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/20/11/3309] [sp47, https://www.osapublishing.org/abstract.cfm?URI=ao-54-30-8904] [sp48, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T.
